name: GrammarNazi
0:
”Alexa open Grammar Nazi”
”Check "he is an boy"”
”Check "followed by your sentence"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grammar nazi
des:
Do you always want to be grammatically correct and hence never feel embarrassed for saying a wrong sentence, We are there to help you.
Just ask, Alexa to open Grammar Nazi and then ask Alexa 
Check "Followed by your own sentence" and get your sentence evaluated.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
